text: Is it possible to have multiple developer sandbox accounts? I’m trying to understand the best way to create a stage site for an existing HS CMS site if we have multiple sites in development. Using a sandbox account for each site would seem logical and clean but I’m not seeing a way to do that.

you can, but that's not likely the best solution for your use-case. Instead, I'd recommend using the Content Staging tool and applying new templates to the existing pages as well as creating net-new ones. You can find that tool in website pages > more tools

Issue with doing everything in a sandbox portal is you create dependencies like CTAs, Forms, etc... that have IDs unique to that sandbox portal, which are a pain to migrate from portal to portal (usually requiring using the APIs).
Thanks for the reply Mark.  So you would content stage the entire site and have new folder that contains all of the new design assets.
ah, I could see where that would get tricky
